description:
When Yoko is kidnapped by a gang, she wants to be rescued by City Hunter so she can expose him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: So ist die Liebe, so ist der Krieg - Teil 2
Target wa Ryou! Focus Lady wa Kiken ga Daisuki! (Kouhen)
The Target Is Ryo! The Camerawoman Loves Danger (Part 2)
標的(ターゲット)は獠! 激写美人(フォーカスレディ)は危険が大好き! (後編)
